insights: Higher acceptance for frequent bar-goers (>3 visits/month).
Low acceptance for infrequent visitors and young adults.
Income and driver status show minor effect on acceptance.
Bar.recommendation: Focus marketing on frequent visitors and consider promotions for young or new customers.

insights: Consistently high acceptance across all conditions.
Minor variation based on age and visit frequency.
Income and driver status slightly influence acceptance.
Carry out & Take away.recommendation: Maintain current coupon strategy and consider loyalty programs.

insights: Acceptance rises with more than 3 visits/month.
Younger or infrequent visitors show lower uptake.
Driver status does not affect coupon usage significantly.
Coffee House.recommendation: Offer tiered rewards for frequent visitors and target campaigns for new or young customers.

insights: Acceptance higher for adults over 25 and frequent visitors.
Low uptake for infrequent visitors and kids.
Income and driver status moderately influence acceptance.
Restaurant(20-50).recommendation: Target regular adult customers and introduce family-friendly promotions.

insights: High acceptance across all conditions.
Young visitors (<30) slightly higher uptake.
Frequent visits and low-income groups show strong acceptance.
Restaurant(<20).recommendation: Maintain coupon distribution and ensure reach to low-income frequent diners.

insights: Carry out & Take away has the highest overall acceptance rate.
Bar and Restaurant(20-50) show the lowest engagement levels.
Weekend-related coupons perform better than weekday ones.
